info.title: Casino-Club F2P API
info.description: Backend API for Casino-Club F2P gaming platform

post.description:
Register a new user with an invite code

- **invite_code**: Valid invite code (required)
- **nickname**: Desired nickname (required)

Returns user info and tokens for immediate login

Login with site ID (no password required in F2P version)

- **site_id**: User site ID

Returns user info and authentication tokens

Refresh access token using a valid refresh token

- **refresh_token**: Valid refresh token

Returns new access token and optional new refresh token

Logout user by invalidating current session and token

Returns confirmation message

get.description:
Get current user profile information

Returns detailed user profile data

List all active sessions for current user

Returns list of active sessions with device info

post.description: Add tokens to user account (admin or special purposes)
Ban a user
Unban a user
Add tokens to a user account (admin only)

Logs an action and publishes it to Kafka.
For now, this is a simplified stub.
Replace user_id and action_type with a Pydantic model (e.g., schemas.ActionCreate) later.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of rewards for a specific user.

schema.title: The ID of the user to get rewards for

post.description:
Distributes a specific reward to a user.
This is the central endpoint for granting rewards from games or events.
Purchase shop item using user's gold tokens

get.description: Get the list of active missions and the current user's progress.

post.description: Claim the reward for a completed mission.

get.description: Get the details, questions, and answers for a specific quiz.

post.description: Submit answers for a quiz and get the resulting risk profile.

get.description:
Get list of available chat rooms
Returns both public and private rooms the user has access to

schema.title: Response List Chat Rooms Api Chat Rooms Get

post.description:
Create a new chat room
User becomes the room creator and first participant

Join a chat room as a participant
Creates participant record and sends join notification

Send a message to a chat room
Only participants can send messages

get.description:
Get messages from a chat room with pagination
Only participants can view messages

schema.title: Response Get Room Messages Api Chat Rooms  Room Id  Messages Get

post.description:
Add a reaction to a message
Users can only have one reaction per message

parameters.name: reaction_type

schema.description: Reaction type: LIKE, LOVE, LAUGH, WOW, SAD, ANGRY
schema.title: Reaction Type

parameters.description: Reaction type: LIKE, LOVE, LAUGH, WOW, SAD, ANGRY

get.description:
Get list of available AI assistants
Returns active AI assistants that users can chat with

schema.title: Response List Ai Assistants Api Chat Ai Assistants Get

post.description:
Send a message to an AI assistant and get a response
Creates conversation history and generates personalized responses

get.description:
Get conversation history with an AI assistant
Returns recent messages in chronological order

post.description:
Generate emotion-based feedback for user

Args:
    request: Feedback request data
        - user_id: User ID
        - emotion: Emotion state
        - segment: User segment
        - context: Additional context information

Returns:
    Feedback response object
